Uses of Package
simulation.engine

Packages that use simulation.engine
simulation.engine   
simulation.gui   
 

Classes in simulation.engine used by simulation.engine
Body
          This class represents a rigid body.
BodySetEvent
          Represents the change in the set of bodies in a Simulation.
BodySetListener
          This listener is notified when the set of bodies in the simulation changes, whether a body is added or taken away.
CollisionCircle
          A circle that has a center and radius.
CollisionPolygon
          A polygon that can collide with other shapes.
CollisionResult
          The result of a collision calculation.
CollisionShape
          A shape that can be tested to see if it collides with another shape.
Maximizer
          A utility class to find the maximum of a bunch of values.
PhysicsEvent
          This represents an event in the System, which models the simulation.
PhysicsListener
          This interface should be implemented by any class that needs to monitor the state of a System.
Simulation
          A system of objects.
Spring
          A spring that connects to objects.
Vector
          A 2-dimensional vector containing an x and y coordinate.
